articles.title: Kate Beckinsale Says She Had Health Crisis That Made Her Vomit 'Copious Amounts of Blood' amid 'Stress and Grief' - PEOPLE
articles.description: Kate Beckinsale is speaking out about the health crisis that led to her extended stay in the hospital earlier this year, saying that grief burned "a hole" in her esophagus which made her "vomit copious amounts of blood."

articles.title: ‘Bridgerton’ Star Simone Ashley Joins ‘F1,’ Starring Brad Pitt and Damson Idris (EXCLUSIVE) - Variety
articles.description: 'Bridgerton' star Simone Ashley has joined the cast of 'F1,' the Formula 1 racing movie starring Brad Pitt and Damson Idris.
articles.content:
“Bridgerton” star Simone Ashley has joined the cast of “F1,” the Formula 1 racing movie starring Brad Pitt.
